string.value: [Notice] If you inform others of your phone verification code, it may be misused for ID withdrawal or cash recharge.
[Notice] Use Party Search to easily find other players.
[Notice] You can allow/disable Party Invitations in the Options screen.
[Notice] An Administrator will never ask for personal information, items, etc. from players. Please beware of scams and anyone impersonating an Administrator.
[Notice] Impersonating an Administrator or violating game policies may result in a ban.
[Notice] Please beware of sharing your personal information, as others could potentially use your Social Security number, phone number, account number, or other information for malicious purposes.
[Notice] Please beware of scams that ask for your personal information, as others could potentially use your phone number, account number, or other information for malicious purposes.

[Notice] Leaking other people's personal information, including but not limited to their Social Security number, phone number, or address, and using it for malicious or fraudulent purposes may result in a ban.
[Notice] Please beware of scams offering mesos, items, botting programs, or other services for cash.
[Notice] Money lost through cash transactions with private vendors will not be compensated and cannot be recovered.
[Notice] Trading or attempt to trade mesos, items, accounts, illegal programs, etc. with cash may result in a ban.
[Notice] Protect your valuable NX! Try using the Nexon Cash Security Setting feature on the Nexon website.
[Notice] Rewarding mesos or items through games of chance will be regarded as gambling and constitutes a violation of the ToS
[Notice] All acts of gambling are prohibited by the ToS and may result in restrictions being placed on you Maple ID.
[Notice] Gambling creates a disruptive environment for other players, and is harmful to the long-term health of the game.
[Notice] Exchanging game assets for cash or other compensation constitutes a violation of the ToS and may result in a ban.
[Notice] Leaking or using other people's personal information constitutes a violation of the ToS and may result in a ban.
[Notice] Always double-check your trade before pressing the Trade button.
[Notice] Beware of fraudulent messages disguised as deliveries! Items and mesos are not delivered through messages.
[Notice] Beware of fraudulent messages, disguised as deliveries! Delivery information is not provided through messages.
[Notice] If you notice players abusing a bug or using an illegal program, please report them on the official MapleStory website under Support > Report Abuse.
[Notice] When you abuse a bug or use an illegal program, your gameplay will be restricted, and abnormally-obtained currencies will be taken away.
[Notice] When you trade or attempt to trade mesos, items, accounts, illegal programs, etc. with cash, you could be banned.
[Announcement] Be aware that malicious programs (hacks, malware, keyloggers, etc.) can be installed on a computer when others have control of your computer remotely through a messenger.
[Announcement] You could face restrictions if another person gains control of your computer remotely and installs a malicious program.
